import {useContext} from 'react' import { Link,useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import {LoginContext} from '../LoginContext' function UserHeader() { const { userLoginName, setUserLoginName, userLoginStatus, setuserLoginStatus } = useContext(LoginContext) const navigate = useNavigate() function handleLogout() { setuserLoginStatus(localStorage.removeItem('userLoginStatus')) setUserLoginName(localStorage.removeItem('userLoginName')) navigate('/') } return (
React
    {userLoginStatus ? <>
  • Welcome {userLoginName}
  • Login
    • :
  • Register
    • }
) } export default UserHeader
